title: Why We Crave Software With Style Over "Branding" - Future
body:
by Molly Mielkeï¼ŒA16z

[https://future.a16z.com/software-style-over-branding/](https://future.a16z.com/software-style-over-branding/)

Within the past few years, tech companiesâ€™ digital design all started to look the same: marginally, monotonously quirky; safe. From the sans-serif fonts to the muted pastel color palette, the stark white backgrounds to the curvy shape and hue of the buttons, most modern software blurs together into a familiar, squint-and-youâ€™ll-confuse-it aesthetic.

Historically, the look of software has been reactive, reflecting the ethos of the times. And for years, that worked. That autotuned design made products seem cool but accessible; youthful, but trustworthy. More recently, however, that comfortably trendy look has grown tired, asÂ  documented in [the sea of identical websites](https://www.fastcompany.com/90501691/science-confirms-it-web-sites-really-do-all-look-the-same).

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Tech-Brands-Today-scaled.jpg)

Modern softwareâ€™s humdrum lack of identity has resulted in users craving more interesting, opinionated tools, tools that feel like us â€” or a better, more interesting, wackier version of us.

As technology advances, software will increasingly be chosen not just for how well it addresses its use case, but how it conveys its personality, similar to how we choose our clothes. Weâ€™re already beginning to see this shift. In highly individualized spheres like note-taking tools and consumer crypto, software is often chosen based on identity. What weâ€™re witnessing, Iâ€™d argue, is the reemergence of *style* in software: the process of humans recognizing and projecting their sense of self onto products â€” turning inanimate pixels into something with soul. This shift directly impacts the type of user and community that forms around the product.

## **Form over function**

Since the early days of the modern computing industry â€” IBM, Hewlett-Packard, and Bell Labs â€” software developers (who were then also the designers) have prided themselves in caring more about the way something *works* than the way it looks. Early computing and software stuck to shades of black, white, and beige â€” the latter ostensibly chosen for its ability to [hide signs of aging](https://www.quora.com/Why-were-most-early-PC-towers-beige). This stubborn devotion to form over function fostered a culture that relished the rejection of aesthetics, at least until the 1970s. Impractical visual and emotional appeal wasnâ€™t considered necessary, nor was it supported by computer bandwidth at the time.

But as the industry advanced in the 1980s and 1990s, more space was created to explore aesthetic choices beyond the basic requirements for functionality. As Nader Salha notes in his book *Aesthetics & Art in the Early Development of Human-Computer Interfaces*, â€œStrictly formal, mathematical reasoning had to be combined with informal, intuitive, aesthetic feeling. The gulf between the two cultures â€” the scientific and the literary â€” had to be bridged if the small computer on the desktop was to obtain wide acceptance.â€ This shift could be seen in the Xerox Starâ€™s distinct portrait-oriented display and child-friendly GUI of the â€™80s; the patterned, neon design of the early Windows OS (and even the introduction of Clippy); playful early software like [Kid Pix](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=csalhuSixQU); and the translucent, fruit-colored iMacs of the â€™90s. All of these products conveyed distinct stylistic opinions about what computing should look and *feel* like, while implicitly hinting at who should use them.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Windows-10-Aesthetic-scaled.jpg)

But at this time, personal computing was still enough of a rarity that software was often created for a highly specific type of person or, in some cases, just one person. Kid Pix, for example, was created by a dad who saw his son struggling to master MacPaint and wanted to make an easier, more fun tool to play with. It didnâ€™t need to have broad appeal, nor was computing broadly available for that purpose.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Kidpix-2-1-scaled.jpg)

Fast forward to today and tools are incentivized to expand their market by attempting to solve everything at once. But this means that the market for any given piece of software is often anyone and everyone.

## **Broad appeal, limited connection**

In tandem with the proliferation of software in the 2010s, we saw the rise of an aesthetic style that has come to be known as skeuomorphism. Prominent tech companies like Microsoft and Apple leaned into a visual style that emphasized relatable realism and a shiny veneer, as seen through Windows Vista and iOS 6. These aesthetics were both compelling and immediately understandable to newcomers because they referenced, allegorically, icons (like garbage cans and file folders) that people already understood.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/iOS-Screenshot-scaled.jpg)

By designing everything on the screen to be as photorealistic as possible, the software essentially negated needing to define its style or stance â€” it merely reflected the world outside of it.

But as trends in culture shifted to more flat, minimal styles, so followed a wave of tech companies that embraced contemporary branding in a similar manner â€” much of which feels [fundamentally the same](https://www.prospectmagazine.co.uk/arts-and-books/when-did-every-brand-start-to-look-the-same). This shared minimal style pulls heavily from Apple-inspired clean curves, Swiss graphic design, misinterpretations [of Bauhaus](https://originalgreen.org/blog/skeuomorphism---how-steve.html), modern sans serifs, and [pastel palettes](https://www.thecut.com/2020/03/will-the-millennial-aesthetic-ever-end.html) to create a look that feels familiar and approachable to the target demographic: the modern millennial (and, increasingly, Gen Z).

From Airbnb to Google to Spotify, this era has come to be defined by the commodification of accessible consumer (and now, even enterprise) brands.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Logo-Transformation-Graphic-1.png)

By appealing to *everyone* with these clean lines, gradients, and rounded shapes, no one feels particularly compelled by them. And while these brands serve their purpose in attracting the â€œrightâ€ demographic to their software, they also make it difficult to form a meaningful connection with the user â€” the product feels like a stylistic blank slate.

## **A return to specificity**

Weâ€™ve now come full circle in the world of software and tech brand design. Software started out being specific â€” designed just for one person even â€” then expanded to a broader audience by trying to appeal to everyone and losing its identity in the process. In the wake of the uniform brand identity crisis in the tech industry, I believe we need to return to *specificity* in order to appeal to users more broadly.

But how do software and tool designers do this? What \*is \*style in software?

Style is not just an eye-catching color or a fun skeuomorphic icon. Style is the indescribable quality that sums up how interacting with something makes a person *feel*. It isnâ€™t simply sprinkling bits of color or animations on top of enterprise software to move metrics. Itâ€™s the feeling the user gets when everything about a product feels specific to a certain personality that they can identify and relate to.

Style matters to our economy, our society, and to each of us personally â€” it allows us to communicate who we are and who we want to be. While it is widely understood that style is the driving force behind [consumer purchasing decisions](https://www.scitechnol.com/peer-review/consumer-purchase-decision-making-process-based-on-the-traditional-clothing-shopping-form-mZst.php?article_id=6373) in things like clothing, Iâ€™d argue that the same has become true in technology and software as well.

Take one example: people are willing to pay $30 a month for an elegant [email client](https://techcrunch.com/2019/06/27/my-six-months-with-30-month-email-service-superhuman/), and even be waitlisted, in part because it feels specific and designed to its core â€” every editorially curated background, communication with the user, and micro-animation is intentional. Itâ€™s that style that organically spreads the word about the product to its aesthetically-inclined [power users](https://a16z.com/2020/01/09/the-developers-way/) to this day.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Superhuman-Screens-scaled.jpg)

Style is not just about intentionality and appeal, however; it can also be what differentiates software companies like [Notion](http://notion.so/), for instance, at the outset. The appâ€™s serene environment, charismatic illustrations, and playful references to technology history stand out in a crowded marketplace of note-taking apps. While those details were altogether unnecessary from a functionality standpoint, they continue to allow users to resonate with Notion and everything that it stands for, which has in turn fostered the companyâ€™s [loyal community](https://foundationinc.co/lab/notion-strategy).

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Notion-scaled.jpg)

Part of this, I believe, is about bringing back an opinionated approach to software design, where the tool asserts itself. For instance, [Linear](https://linear.app/)â€™s sleek, luminous feel and decisive approach to how work should be done shows how an unwavering commitment to a specific measure of pixel-perfect quality can be incredibly compelling. Similarly, a product like [Cash App](https://cash.app/) demonstrates how style within a stagnant industry (in this case a financial tool) feels memorable and intriguing â€” everything from the companyâ€™s illustrations to its tone of voice tells you that this tool is trying (and, for the most part, succeeding) to be seen as cool by the millennial and Gen Z demographic. Itâ€™s the clear correlation between Cash Appâ€™s style and its mission of â€œredefining the worldâ€™s relationship with moneyâ€ that makes it feel so magnetic to those it is being marketed to. This ethos is apparent in everything from the brandâ€™s [apparel line](https://hypebeast.com/2020/12/cash-by-cash-app-streetwear-line-release-date-info) to editorial-like storytelling work such as â€œ[My First Bitcoin and the Legend of Satoshi Nakamoto,](https://cash.app/bitcoin)â€ a microsite that tells the story of the features and benefits as a preamble to engaging with the product â€” all of which feels directly aligned with their mission, and is culturally progressive for the financial sector.

While the aforementioned examples appeal to user appeal, there is also a deeper level to discuss here: community and identity. While crypto historically prioritized function over form, the space has more recently emerged as a leader in experimenting with using style as a competitive advantage. The crypto industry is now an obvious example of how style, identity, and community can come together. But it also pulls heavily from proven stylistic hype patterns from the art and fashion industries â€” namely auctions and â€œdropsâ€ to generate momentum and create scarcity or early adopter appeal. Once youâ€™re a part of the crypto community, everything from your choice of crypto wallet to which [cryptopunk](https://techcrunch.com/2021/04/08/the-cult-of-cryptopunks/) you might decide to purchase is tied to identity.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/CryptoPunks-1-scaled.jpg)

## **Looking to the past as a guide for the future**

Taking a step back, a broader collective fear around online fatigue â€” notification overload, too many tools, and too many hours spent scrolling and conferencing â€” has been articulated, [particularly during Covid](https://theprint.in/features/covid-has-brought-digital-overload-not-just-fatigue/586678/). This sentiment has spurred a nostalgia for how we used to interact with technology, back when it felt novel, fun, and more of our own choosing.

Such nostalgia has been seen, design-wise, in everything from 8-bit and pixel art to Pokemon Go. Itâ€™s a more regressive â€œreturnâ€ to functionality over form â€” forms that are unapologetically reflective of the toolâ€™s purpose for a smaller, more specific audience. For this reason, websites like [Craigslist](https://sfbay.craigslist.org/) and [Are.na](https://www.are.na/) strike a chord: Their analog internet style and chunky buttons feel daring and intriguing in this modern context. Compared to the blasÃ©, blue-branded modern tools we all spend so much of our time using today â€” and that contribute to that uniform sameness described earlier â€” these tools feel decidedly rich with personality. It either resonates with you or not, but itâ€™s almost better to be different in an old way than the same in a new way.

![](https://future.a16z.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/10/Are.na_-scaled.jpg)

Style can also make rebrand [attempts](https://www.inc.com/jason-aten/microsoft-just-rebranded-bing-did-one-thing-no-brand-should-ever-do.html) from large tech companies feel as though those companies lack conviction or depth â€” the brand identities often seem like a flimsy facade thatâ€™s disconnected from how we perceive the companyâ€™s personality, and actions, in the world. It seems that this dilution of stylistic authenticity occurs frequently when massive companies attempt to unify their look over a multitude of sub-brands, each one becoming a blander version of itself in the name of consistency.

Iâ€™d argue that thereâ€™s something to be said for retaining stylistic specificity of sub-brands past the point of justification â€” people care more about stylistic consistency than they do about understanding a unibrandâ€™s org structure (unless it actually impacts their experience using the software). While style is difficult to scale due to variations in employeesâ€™ subjective interpretations, it is not impossible. Large companies like Apple that have successfully maintained their stylistic stronghold prove this. It also points to the value of their extensive [brand guidelines](https://www.apple.com/legal/sales-support/certification/docs/logo_guidelines.pdf); intention to hire only for a specific type of [style-aware person](https://fortune.com/2018/04/02/apple-jony-ive-naomi-campbell-steve-jobs/); and design (or as they call it, [user experience](https://bstrategyhub.com/apple-mission-statement-vision-core-values/)) being one of the companyâ€™s core founding values.

\*Â  \*Â  \*

Evaluating software by its style â€” and how it makes us feel â€” signifies a shift to recognizing tech as a part of our society and identity, as opposed to an inanimate tool without an opinion. Software has become so integrated into our lives that it is no longer simply a utility. Within this new state of the world, style communicates the softwareâ€™s values and signals the type of person for whom it is intended â€” something that many tech brands today consistently fail to do.

In a world where â€œwe shape our tools and thereafter our tools shape usâ€ has become common understanding, how will software companies embracing the power of aesthetics reshape the fabric of our culture? And more importantly for designers and builders, how will we choose to shape our working environments to become places where teams holding a similar stylistic vision can build software that feels more human?

* **Molly Mielke** is a product designer at Figma and producer of Notion's Tools & Craft podcast. She writes about creativity and the history of computing.

title: Creatress Collective Chronicles .001 - Creatress - Medium
body:
For me, Sarai, it started on Jan 2, 2021.

I got the Clubhouse invite from Matt Sibert my friend on FB, he offered invites on his timeline and I asked; intrigued about the buzz around a new app.

I wondered â€” How great could it be?

![Creatress Sarai seen at her desk working on art and listening to clubhouse, preparing for the next chronicle. ](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*OcAPWZIa2k5NPhiDG7-KBA.jpeg)

Well, settle in and get comfortable because almost a year has passed and I can confidently say: the app has changed my life in a more than a few ways.

I started out by jumping into rooms recommended by the app, based on the few â€œrecommendedâ€ people I followed. I didnâ€™t speak much at first, it was scary to think about; everyone seemed so professional.

It was a lot of business talk at first, networking, e-commerce, and comedy and cannabis rooms. A lot of buzz went around when Gary Vaynerchuck, Zuck and a few other â€œwell knownâ€ figures joined the app and actually spoke in a few rooms. I jumped into the â€œroomâ€ Gary was speaking in felt excited to be part of something really new and exciting like this new app. I was hooked pretty quickly, I called a few close friends and texted out invites to a few, trying to explain how much I was learning.

After a few weeks of saturating my brain with an information overload from all the rooms I jumped into throughout the days, I started to look for something different.

Thatâ€™s about the time when I found the art roomsâ€¦ Full of writers, poets, painters, toy makers, and artists of every medium. To be fair, I believe the art communities on clubhouse deserve their own few chapters. More on those magical spaces on the next chronicleâ€¦buen dia, y hasta el proximo amig@s.

title: Exclusive concealed weapon
body:
"Hahahahahaha..."Tang three laughing, suddenly backward steps, at this moment, the tang door elders suddenly found that there was no one in time to stop him, his body in the white light enveloped, lightning rushed to the front of the ghosts and worries, tall and high body aloft, toward the mountain clouds.

"Wait a minute."Mr. Tang finally understood, but it was too late for him to say anything more.

The clouds are very thick, with bursts of moisture, took away the sun, also took away the life will contribute to the Tang door and the Tang three.

Time seems to have stopped, Mr. Tang's hands trembling hold up in front of the three flowers of the Tang lotus, his eyes moist, "Tang three ah Tang three, why are you suffering?You have surprised us so much..."

"Big brother."The second elder stepped forward. "Why be grieved by this traitor?"

Mr. Tang's eyes suddenly turned cold, the whole body cold sheng, staring at the two elders, "who do you say is a traitor?Have you ever seen a traitor who won't run away after he gets the highest secret in this house?Have you ever seen a traitor die for his cause?You have seen a good enough to destroy any master tang door of the unique hidden weapon but he as a final gift to tang door?Tang three is not a traitor, he is two hundred years, this door's most outstanding genius."

Two elder one stay, "but, he stole to learn this door......"

Mr. Tang suddenly interrupted, "If you can also make Buddha anger Tang Lian, I don't care what you steal.You were wrong, I was wrong, just a moment ago, we actually helplessly looked at tang door again brilliant opportunity slip away from the eyes."

All the elders gathered around, their faces are very complicated, confused, sad, sigh, more or regret.

title: Creatress Collective Chronicles .001 - Creatress - Medium
body:
For me, Sarai, it started on Jan 2, 2021.

I got the Clubhouse invite from Matt Sibert my friend on FB, he offered invites on his timeline and I asked; intrigued about the buzz around a new app.

I wondered â€” How great could it be?

![Creatress Sarai seen at her desk working on art and listening to clubhouse, preparing for the next chronicle. ](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1\*OcAPWZIa2k5NPhiDG7-KBA.jpeg)

Well, settle in and get comfortable because almost a year has passed and I can confidently say: the app has changed my life in a more than a few ways.

I started out by jumping into rooms recommended by the app, based on the few â€œrecommendedâ€ people I followed. I didnâ€™t speak much at first, it was scary to think about; everyone seemed so professional.

It was a lot of business talk at first, networking, e-commerce, and comedy and cannabis rooms. A lot of buzz went around when Gary Vaynerchuck, Zuck and a few other â€œwell knownâ€ figures joined the app and actually spoke in a few rooms. I jumped into the â€œroomâ€ Gary was speaking in felt excited to be part of something really new and exciting like this new app. I was hooked pretty quickly, I called a few close friends and texted out invites to a few, trying to explain how much I was learning.

After a few weeks of saturating my brain with an information overload from all the rooms I jumped into throughout the days, I started to look for something different.

Thatâ€™s about the time when I found the art roomsâ€¦ Full of writers, poets, painters, toy makers, and artists of every medium. To be fair, I believe the art communities on clubhouse deserve their own few chapters. More on those magical spaces on the next chronicleâ€¦buen dia, y hasta el proximo amig@s. 

|Creatress|

title: The stomach is white
body:
He was only five or six years old, and he was obviously constantly warmed by the sun. His skin was a healthy wheaten color, his short black hair looked neat, and his clothes, though simple, were clean.

It was not an easy climb for a boy of his age, but when he reached the top of the hill, he was not red or out of breath, and he looked quite at himself.

The boy sat down on the top of the mountain, his eyes staring at the east that gradually bright white fish belly, nose slowly inhale, and then slowly spit out from the mouth, inhale, expiratory slightly, it formed a wonderful cycle.

At that moment his eyes suddenly widened, and amid the brightening whiteness of the fish's belly on the horizon seemed a faint violet, which would have been impossible to detect had it not been for his extraordinary vision and concentration.

The appearance of purple qi, so that the boy's spirit completely focused, he did not even breathe out, only slightly and slowly inhale, at the same time, eyes closely staring at the evanescent purple.

Purple has been around for a short time, and by the time the fish-belly whiteness of the east was gradually covered by the color of the rising sun, it had completely disappeared.

The boy slowly closed his eyes and exhaled the stale air in his body.A stream of white air came out of his mouth like a horse, and then slowly dispersed.

Sitting quietly for a long time, the boy opened his eyes again, I do not know whether because of the day side purple infected, his eyes actually flashing a layer of light purple meaning, although this purple did not last too long time quietly convergence, but when it exists, it is so clear.

Frustrated with a sigh, the boy made a should never appear in his age helpless expression, shook his head, soliloquize way: "or not, my xuan Day power still can't break through the first heavy bottleneck.It's been three months. Why on earth?Even if it is the need to rely on purple east can only early morning practice purple extreme magic pupil has been in progress.Xuan Tian Gong can not break the bottleneck, my black jade hand can not do any more improvement.When I was practicing, I didn't seem to encounter such a situation between the first and second weights.Xuantian gong a total of nine heavy, how this first heavy so trouble?Is it because this world is different from the one I came from?"

title: Increasingly, tombs
body:
One pale hand came out of the grave, and then another, clinging to the edge of the grave, and a young man with a vacant face crept slowly up from the grave, his tousled hair smeared with mud, his tattered clothes clinging to his body.Apart from his unusually pale face, the young man looked very ordinary, the kind of character you would never notice in a crowd.

"What is this place? Why am I here?"The young man muttered to himself, looking more confused at the mass of graves before him.

Suddenly he was fascinated by the inscription on a nearby tomb. It would have been a surprise to see the young man gazing intently at the ancient writing at which even the old scholars of the Anticulture Association could only shake their heads and sigh.

At the moment of reading the inscription, the young man's face changed dramatically and exclaimed: "The tomb of the Eastern warrior god zhan Wuji, is this... is this true? Is this really zhan Wuji, the legendary figure who reigned all over the world in those days?

"The tomb of Caesar, the Western god of war, Caesar? Is it the Western god in gold armour and sword in hand?"

He looked around as if something had occurred to him. Tall tombs of gods and demons stood out against the setting sun.

"The tomb of peony fairy, the tomb of Nasi, the western goddess of wisdom, the tomb of Li Changfeng, the tomb of The Proud Heaven, the tomb of Lucifer, the great devil of the West..."

What's wrong with this world? Are... the gods dead, are... buried here?"The young man's face became ghastly, and there was a strange look on his face.

"But... how come the gods of the magical lands of the East and the magical lands of the West are buried together?"

Suddenly, the young man noticed the small grave at his feet, and he froze. Cold sweat soaked through his tattered clothes, and he felt cold as if he had fallen into an ice cellar.

"I... I... crawled out of the grave..."His eyes were blank, his soul seemed torn from his body, and he fell feebly to the ground.

"I am Chennan, I am... dead, but... I come back..."

title: cavity
body:
"Does God want me to continue my mediocre life as a worthless person?!"Shocked after, Chen Nan face in addition to vacant, more is the color of pain, he closed his eyes, his hands forcibly embraced the head.

He remembered clearly that he had been beaten to death in a duel, and now...

Past scenes float on my mind, that once, that disappeared, that eternal......Left too much regret in his heart!

The world was still wide, the flowers still fragrant, but his heart was empty, not a trace of land.

After a long time Chen Nan just slowly from the ground to climb up, his eyes began to wander in the cemetery, finally he finally determined that this is a tomb belonging to the gods and demons, after the shock, he gradually calm down.

"The most hard stone gravestones have obviously carved on the vicissitudes of time, this probably needs ten thousand years, the vicissitudes of time, ten thousand years long and over, hey hey... a dream forever!"Chennan sighed.

He looked at the forest of tombstones and was filled with doubts.

"Roar tiger Xiao Zhen's tomb, the tomb of the three demon dragon rui, wu Sheng Liang feng's tomb, the curtain of god knight Otto force... it seems that in addition to the gods and demons, there are also buried here in some of the strong human and a few of the alien practitioners."

"What happened 10,000 years ago? Why did the immortal god die? Why were the gods of the magic land and the magic land buried together?

The breeze blew gently, blowing messy his long hair, but also his lonely heart.

Chennan looked up to the sky and shouted, "Who can tell me what happened?"

No one answered him.

The tall snow maple trees in the distance were falling petals all over the sky, drifting profuse in the air, falling flowers like rain of tears, the dead gods were crying!

"God is dead, the devil is out, I am still alive... God why did you let me climb out of the grave, where am I going?"

As the sun set on the western hills, sunset dyed half of the sky red, the red clouds of the horizon inlaid with phnom penh.

Chen Nan picked up the lost feelings, he knew that some things simply have no choice, can only go step by step.

He carefully filled the small grave at his feet with earth, and then walked out of the cemetery.He had never seen a tree with so much spirit in it before.Could it be, he wondered, a new tree that had appeared in his long "sleep"?

title: Pure white petals
body:
He remembered the "she" in his heart...

"The vicissitudes of life... Alas!"Chennan shook his head and strode out of the forest.

When he walked out of the snow maple forest, it was also the setting sun, the original peaceful cemetery is not calm, dark spirit rising from the cemetery, endless darkness began to cover the whole cemetery.

Chennan vaguely heard a roar from behind, but he did not care, he thought the beast began to appear after sunset.He stretched his muscles and said to himself, "It's been ten thousand years and you haven't gotten rusty yet."He knew he wasn't very good at kung fu, but he should have no problem dealing with the average beast.

Not far from the snow maple forest in front of three huts, a bony old man stood in front of the door, all hair and beard, the face of the weather-beaten wrinkles.

A ineffable mood rises in Chen Nan heart, this is the first person that sees after he is reborn for a person, there is a kind, there is a lost, there is a confused...

Ten thousand years ago he was born in front of his parents, ten thousand years later he was born again, but faced with such an old man.

"How can I relate my parents to this old man?"He gave a self-deprecating smile.

The old man, leaning on a crutch, came staggering toward him, as if a gust of wind could blow him over.

Chennan hurried forward to hold the old man, the old man waved his hand, beckoning him to release, with a reproachful tone said a few words to him, but Chennan did not understand a word.

The cryptic voice sent a chill through his heart, and he realized that ten thousand years had passed and that the continental languages of his day had been abandoned by history.

He had hoped to learn about the world through the old man, but the language barrier dashed his hope.

When the old man saw the dull look in his eyes, his face softened and his voice softened, but when he saw the blank look on his face, he frowned and took him by the hand and walked towards the hut.

Chen Nan wooden behind the old man, intuition told him that the old man did not mean him harm, but because of language barrier, he can only pretend to be deaf and dumb.

The old man led him to the hut and pointed to the bucket on the ground and to the well not far away. Then he went inside.

"Let me fetch water? Does he want me to work here as a drudge?"Chen Nan secretly guess.

When the old man reappeared, he knew he had wronged him, and with his thin hands he held out a half-new suit, which the old man evidently wished him to change.

Looking at the faint smile on the old man's face, he turned red. He was shabby, unkempt and dirty.

Chen South heart a burst of dejected, ten thousand years ago he ever so embarrassed, he silently lifted the barrel to the well.

He moved his body and, with a slight exertion, his tattered clothes fell to the ground.

This is the god silkworm treasure clothes ah!Time is the most ruthless, when fire and water do not invade, invulnerable treasure clothes also can not resist years of erosion!

The cold well water washed away the dirt on his body, but it could not wash away the trouble in his heart.

"What should I do? If I don't know the language of today's mainland, I can't communicate with people. How can I survive in this world?"

Chennan put on the clothes the old man had prepared for him and went to the hut and smiled at the old man to express his gratitude.

A burst of rice fragrance came, the old man slowly to the side of the stove, and beckoned him over.

title: boiling
body:
Lord Raymond, commander of the Imperial Expeditionary Fleet, stood on forecastle Hill, looking impassively at the cheering crowds in the harbor.

At thirty-nine, the first class general of the Empire, the Count of the Empire, was now in his best dress, covered in light armour, his scarlet cloak rustling behind him, and wearing on his chest two MEDALS from his two previous expeditions.And there was no doubt that this triumph would win him the count's eyes were distracted, and his eyes were not fixed on the cheering crowds in the harbour, but on closer examination the count's brow seemed vaguely wrinkled and impatient.

Damn it, this armor is too heavy and stupid!

His lordship did not think that such heavy armour would be necessary for a man in a naval fleet to fight at sea.That's army stuff.As for the wearing of these MEDALS, it was a foolish thing in the count's mind.It was as if the nouveau riche were flaunting his wealth -- something a true aristocrat would disdain to do.He felt that such a move was beneath him.

Moreover, the cheering crowds below were so loud that their shouts, like the waves of a tsunami, ate away at the count's scarce patience.

Unconsciously glancing at the deck below.

The dandong had been painted three days earlier for today's welcoming ceremony, and the decks were blood-free.The decks that had been worn out in the expeditionary wars had been re-laid, and the Angle of the bow had been renewed...Why, those who like to flatter the Emperor, have turned the horn of the bow into a statue of the Emperor himself, and it is said that this statue was made by the hands of one of the great masters of the Empire a few days ago.

The Imperial Navy paid an additional 10,000 ducats.

I mean, it's tough enough.But don't those fools know that in a battle at sea, the first thing that breaks when warships collide is the Angle of the bow?

It seemed to him that the ten thousand ducats were unjustly spent.The master carver's work is not even as practical as a random sharp wooden stake.

In fact, on a deeper level, Lord Ramon thought in his heart of hearts that organizing the so-called X Imperial Expeditionary Fleet had been a ridiculous and absurd mistake.

From several decades ago, the Empire began one "expedition" after another in the South China Sea region.

It is undeniable that there are countless islands scattered like pearls over the vast waters, where there are strange forests, where there are wild and foolish tribes of natives still in the gentile stage, where there are gold, precious stones, spices, and seafood.

A hundred paces beyond the quay, the soldiers of the embattled imperial police were straining themselves to the limit.Many of their clothes were torn, their shiny epaulettes ripped off, their swagger hats ripped off, even their boots trampled off.

To the dismay of the 1, 000 police soldiers assigned to maintain order outside the port, they faced a crowd of more than 50, 000 enthusiastic citizens of the imperial capital.

Enthusiastic onlookers prepared flowers, cheers, applause - and, of course, many girls were even prepared to offer kisses and even their virginity.In the midst of such emotional turmoil, a thousand security men felt like a broken ship in the middle of a vast ocean, ready to be capsized.

At the moment they envied the guards standing within the dock cordon, who could easily line up and display the brightest armour and weapons they had just been given, without fear of being snapped in the face by some fanatical citizen the next moment.

For this grand triumphal event, the length of the Lancang Grand Canal from the imperial capital was doubled under the order of the great Emperor Augustine VI!It cost the empire ten thousand river workers for six months, and nearly three million ducats from the empire's Treasury.

And pay these costs, the purpose is just to let the empire "X expeditions fleet" flagship "Dandong" can smoothly through the canal to the east port outside the imperial capital, accept the cheers of the people, in order to demonstrate the empire's powerful force.

No one cares if a display of status is worth paying the price.

For the former chancellor of the Exchequer, who had first raised strong objections, had been sent straight back to his old home by the angry Emperor.The chancellor's only choice was how to squeeze as much money as possible out of the empire's coffers to satisfy the "old man of great achievement".

Of course, the term "jolly old man" can only be buried deep in the Chancellor's heart, deep, deep...

As the afternoon sun beat down on the canal's wide surface and the first sails took shape in the distance, the crowd roared uncontrollably.

As the river on the two hundred paces of the huge battleship slowly approached the harbor, the battleship's majestic and mighty outline shocked all the citizens of the imperial capital who came to watch.

The flagship of the empire's sixth expeditionary fleet, "Dandong", the pride of the Imperial Navy, the largest ship in the history of the Imperial Navy.The ship had been thoroughly repainted and refurbished for the grand welcome, painted a forbidding black, and with wave after wave of cheering, the Dandong approached the harbor like a giant black monster, a huge briar-flower flag flying from her mast.

title: Huge battleship
body:
The count would not think anything wrong with that.The weak have always been bullied by the strong, and the weak need to remain subservient to the strong.But what he thought was wrong with imperial policy towards the South Ocean was that these expeditions, as they were called, had been carried out too often and seemed to have less and less effect.

On two or three early expeditions, the mighty Imperial navy swept the South Seas, and shiploads of gold and spices brought back to the empire caused a sensation.

But after all, no matter how rich the granary, it can not withstand such a frequent harvest.Excessive plundering made the indigenous tribes near the South Ocean extinct one after another. Later, the expeditionary force had to go farther and farther on its voyage route. The extension of route was a huge test for the supply of the fleet.

After all, the South Ocean is not only the natives who are easily bullied, nor is it only the gold and precious stones, but also the hot weather, the changing climate, the terrible waves, and countless reefs, whirlpools, storms...

Overharvesting quickly desolated what could have been the breadbasket of the empire.Subsequent expeditions yielded less each time.Ironically, however, the triumphal ceremony is getting bigger every time...

Count Raymond himself had commanded three expeditions in recent years, which had given his lordship great fame in the South Seas.The Imperial Admiral, the Count, had a string of nicknames in The South Pacific:

The robber!The butcher!The executioner!...His hands were stained with the blood of the natives, and he was the notorious aggressor of the aboriginal clans and tribes, the demon who burned their homes and enslaved them.

Of course the Count did not care, but the only thing that disturbed him was that the excessive aggression had in some way distorted the development of these Natives, especially in terms of force.Even before he returned, he had heard that in the far southern seas, some of the islanders had formed what was called an alliance to fight the empire's endless depredations.

Fortunately, those worries were no longer his concern.For he knew very well that this was his last expedition.Next, he will stay in the imperial city, if all goes well, he will get a prominent position in the empire high command, and then mix a decade eight years, and now the sea after retirement, with the influence of his family, he would become the new military affairs minister, if again good luck a little bit, perhaps in the last years of political career, a feeling when prime minister of addiction.

As for the expedition, go to war.That will be a headache for the next fleet commander of the Expeditionary Force.

Even if the natives had evolved enough to make a demonic cannon, that would be their own problem.

The count descended from the flagship deck in the midst of a wave of cheers, and his feet touched the imperial capital at last!He waved to the cheering crowd...Only this way, it's more like swatting away flies.

First a courtly servant came on board and read the Emperor's order of commendation, and announced that the count would come in the morning before the Emperor to receive his honours.

The wish was fulfilled, and the political future was bright.

But then a servant in grey pressed forward and whispered another piece of news in the count's ear, and this news made Count Raymond's heart sink!

The news came from home.

The expedition went out for more than three years, and the vast sea made it inconvenient to transmit information.Ramon doesn't know what's going on at home.

The most important thing is his wife.When he left for the war three years ago, his wife was close to giving birth, and now he didn't even know if the baby was a son or a daughter!

The news at home was: it was the son.

title: The central region of the Sarast continent
body:
With the "bang" a loud noise, was the residents of the world as the creation of god and destruction of god's two gods once again in the fierce struggle to separate, with the explosion of light disappeared together with thousands of angels, demons and two unlucky injured under the gods,At this time the sky is no longer blue, but under the shock of powerful forces constantly changing uncanny color, countless angels, demons, and dozens of worship by people call it god's creatures is divided into two camps in the constant fight, and on the ground, and people following my belief in gods fierce fighting with each other,The ground is not as blood-red as it is supposed to be, for the next moment it is blown away by a terrifying spell of magical energy and air, and if all goes well in the history books of the future of this world it may read:"In XXX, the gods of light and darkness and their followers in the barren plains of the Land of Sarast launched a decisive battle, the light (dark) side ended in victory, later known as the XX war..."

But the reality is often surprising, as the two sides played inextricably, creation god suddenly the accumulation of energy released at a draught, previously in the destruction of god not to react instantly with his sword through the other side of the body, face at the same time shouldn't be on the goodness of god in the face, then suddenly quiet down on the battlefield,Despair appeared on the face of the darkness, ecstasy on the face of the light, and just as the situation was settled, a sly smile appeared on the face of the Destroyer, while his sword suddenly appeared out of nowhere from behind the Creator and nailed him to him, and the Creator was astonished,With a look of indignation and delight, the saboteur uttered the words only the two of them could hear: "Mr. Hypocrite, don't worry, I won't have the heart to leave you alone!"

"You..."The Creation god had barely time to say the word before he and the destruction God were torn to pieces by the power of their swords.

Next to the audience as if did not see this scene as silly looking at the void of the sky, poor brain processing this unthinkable scene, more poor is that they will never have to react to this day.

Because at this moment from creation and destruction god scattered the energy lost master together after the distorted space finally formed a small transparent colorless crystals, crystal's slowly with a strange light seemed to constantly absorbing something invisible, then begin around the edges of the crystal with a "bang" sound, the space opened a big seam,Then around like a chain reaction "bang" sound of "crash", crack spreading around at the speed of unimaginable, haven't caught on the edge of the audience don't have any feelings is crack to shreds, absorption and crack is not ended so advance footsteps, continuously spread to every corner of the world and destruction after all things,Countless invisible things flow down the fissure toward its source, the SPAR.

As things invisible SPAR absorbed last no longer luminous gray, after all the world like a broken mirror along the fracture broken into many pieces, and these pieces and then continue to shatter, decomposition and disappear, finally can prove that the world has existed objects left with that piece of grey SPAR.

I don't know how long, may be a year, may be a week, may also be a second, a strange door appeared in front of the SPAR, a man in a gray hooded robes from the inside of the door before go out to the SPAR put out a thin made up the SPAR action mechanized lost to robe pocket, then a tired voice bubbled up from the hem of the robe in the hood:

title: Almost hysterical invective in hundreds of languages
body:
Patriarch grandpa's words let my eyes immediately open up, yes...I am no match for them now, but I am only 11 years old, I am still young, as long as I keep working hard, then...A few years later, I will certainly surpass them, I have this confidence, this is the confidence of genius, I will never let anyone above me, I always walk in front of all others, was like this before, will not change!

Since decided to leave, decided to go to revenge, so I will never delay, have to say goodbye to the partners, but I did not say what I want to do, because once I say, I am afraid all the partners will go with me.

Before I was about to leave, the patriarchs grandpa did not know why, forced me to say goodbye to Nasha, since the tragedy happened, 19 years old Nasha seemed to mature overnight, let me and her alone together, a little confused feeling.

Especially when she was staring at me, but...Think, this leave, a year and a half is impossible to come back, very likely, never come back, Nasha sister took care of me so much, I should go to good farewell is.

Came to the corner of the cave where nasha sister lives, I coughed gently, light way: "Nasha sister, I am cold Mo, can I come in please?"

Soon...Inside came sister Nessa's surprised voice: "Ah!Little mo...Is it Mo?Come in!"

In fact, it was only the corner of a cave, enclosed in a narrow space of skins, which was called a room.

Patriarch grandpa has decided, in the cave most end of the cylindrical cliff cave, after......People live there, but...It's obviously a big project that can't be done in a day or two, for now...Everyone has to live here.

Slowly into Sister Nessa's little room, eh...Girlish, the floor was covered with soft skins, and over the skins were scented bedding made of soft Slime, but...The scent was not Slim's, but Sister Nessa's.

title: If early arrival
body:
The next day early in the morning, I took a big bag of dried papaya, carrying my hundred swords, in all companions farewell, resolutely set foot on the journey, in the corner of the cave, beautiful Nasha has been crying into tears.

Before I left, I went to see silver Wolf, who is also a very important friend and partner of mine...I was about to leave, and I didn't know if I had a chance to come back alive, so OF course I wanted to say goodbye.

After I took care of the dwarves, I left, escorted by the Silver Wolf and his six runnable children, for the human land!

Wild land, everywhere is warcraft, the degree of danger is simply creepy, there are several times, I almost died in the mouth of the beast, if it wasn't for me and that little bit of wisdom, timely escape, I don't know how many times to die.

A month later, I finally walked across the wilderness, dressed in clothes, into the human realm, from this moment on...My journey of revenge has officially begun, and my goal is very clear -- to find and kill all those who took part in the Dwarven massacre!

Tightly pinched the hand of memory crystal, this is before I left from the patriarch grandpa there to come, in order not to miss an enemy, I want to check them, as long as it is to participate in the massacre, a do not want to live, this is my cold mo oath!

Looking at the front not far from the magnificent city, I tidy up the appearance, after all...I will see so many people in a short time. If I don't tidy up neatly, HOW can I do it? People want face and trees want skin. I don't want everyone to look at me with strange eyes.

But......In my tidy, confident came to the gate of the city, but by the gate of a group of people stopped down, with me for what sunset empire ID card!

This I can stare, what id card!I didn't think...It's not just the earth, it's here too, but...I don't even know where to do it. I don't know where to do it!

On hearing that I had no ID card, all the people immediately surrounded me and looked at me with wary eyes. One of them said coldly, "You'd better not try to resist, because then you will only die miserably. Now...Please cooperate, raise your hands above your head, follow us back to investigate!"

Looking at these sharply dressed men with swords at their waists, I wondered...They're probably the equivalent of the police on earth, so...I had better follow honestly, anyway I haven't done anything bad, what can they do to me?

Soon I was escorted by six soldiers. The others remained at the gate, and with six soldiers I entered the broad streets of the city.

The streets were completely paved with huge bluestones, very flat and smooth, looking...I already have some ideas. The surface of the stone is very smooth.

On both sides of the street are tall rock buildings. Although the shapes of the buildings are different, the city planning is quite good, neat and clean. All the buildings are built along a straight line with the same width, giving a very systematic and formal feeling.

The street was full of pedestrians, and when they saw me passing under the escort of six soldiers, they all stopped and looked at me curiously, perhaps...There are few people like me who don't have identification.

I don't care how people look at me, after all...I didn't really do anything wrong, so...While others looked at me curiously, I looked at them curiously.

People here and I still have a very obvious difference, their hair color is more complex, there are red, blue, yellow, golden yellow, green......At a glance, colorful, but also good-looking, but...Looked along while, I just did not see black, the closest to my hair color, but to be brown, no wonder they will see me, this hair color, probably one of the reasons.

The next...It's eye color, that's more, purple, blue, red, pink, green, yellow...Every color you can imagine can be found in the crowds on the street, but...The only one without black!They all looked at me in surprise, which was not without reason.

The dress is very European, and The Chinese dress is not quite the same, but a little European medieval dress feeling, very beautiful, also very elegant, look very comfortable.

As for height, shape, these are not too big difference, if I mixed in the crowd, I'm afraid I will be mixed in a short time, it is difficult to find out, and...In terms of facial features, limbs and so on, they are indeed as human as I am!

After walking for about ten minutes, we came to a huge square. The square was empty, except for a huge fountain in the middle, the whole square was empty.

# How to contribute KSM on PolkaSmith Crowdloan Site

Most approved third-party platforms to host crowdloan like MEXC, OKEx will only be available when the crowdloan opens.

Good news! You donâ€™t have to wait and can make an early contribution now on our official PolkaSmith crowdloan site. Here is the step by step instruction:

1. Prepare a certain amount of KSM in a Kusama account to support PolkaSmith. Please note that KSM needed to be unstaked at least seven days to be used in crowdloan;
2. Visit the [PolkaSmith Crowdloan site](https://polkasmith.polkafoundry.com/#contribute), click **\[Connect Polkadot.js Extension\],** save your Referral Code to send it later to your friends
3. Scroll down to enter the amount of KSM to contribute and your ERC-20 wallet, click **\[Submit Contribution\];**
4. A popup will appear. Enter your **\[Password\]** and hit **\[Sign the transaction\].** Now on the page, it will show â€œYou have successfully contributed.â€

body:
# Letâ€™s Join the $PETS IDO Pool on Red Kite Launchpad Now!

# Schedule for $PETS IDO pool

* Whitelist Opening: 01:00 PM UTC, October 21
* Whitelist Closing: 05:00 AM UTC, October 25
* Winner announcement: October 25, 2021
* IDO pool date: **Tuesday, October 26, 2021**
* Buying time Phase 1 (Guaranteed allocation): 11:00 AM UTC â€” 12:00 PM UTC
* Buying time Phase 2 (FCFS): 12:00 PM UTC â€” 12:15 PM UTC
* Claiming time: 03:00 PM UTC, **October 28**

*See more information about the $PETS Community pool [HERE](https://medium.com/polkafoundry/no-tier-or-whitelist-is-required-lets-participate-in-the-polkapets-community-pool-a68f8cfd6ecd).*

# ğŸ“ IDO pool details

* Token type: ERC20
* Price per token: $**0.3** per $PETS
* Vesting schedule: Unlock **30%** at TGE, linear over 3 months
* Accepted currency for token buying: BUSD
* Users will buy $PETS in the **BSC network** and sell in the **MoonRiver network**
* Tokens will be **distributed to usersâ€™ wallets directly** without claiming
* Restricted countries: United States of America, China, Hong Kong, and all sanctioned OFAC countries (DR Congo, Iran, Myanmar, Sudan, Iraq, Ivory Coast, North Korea, Syria, Zimbabwe, Cuba, Belarus, Liberia)
* Token allocation: $**97,000**
* Minimum tier: Dove

# ğŸ“– How to join the PolkaPets IDO pool on Red Kite?

To be eligible for PolkaPets public offerings on Red Kite, please complete the following steps:

# 1ï¸âƒ£ Step 1: Follow PolkaPetsâ€™s and PolkaFoundryâ€™s social channels below:

* Follow Twitter accounts: [@PolkaPets](https://twitter.com/polkapets) and [@PolkaFoundry](https://twitter.com/PolkaFoundry),
* Join community groups: [@PolkapetWorld](https://t.me/polkapetworld) and [@PolkaFoundry](https://t.me/PolkaFoundry),
* Subscribe to announcement channels: [@PolkaPet](https://t.me/PolkaPet) and [@PolkaFoundryANN](https://t.me/PolkaFoundryANN).
* Like and retweet **the [IDO announcement tweet ](https://twitter.com/PolkaFoundry/status/1451174237381672963)**with hashtags **#RedKite #PolkaPets $PKF $PETS**

***ğŸ“Œ NOTE:*** *Users who **belong** to Eagle and Phoenix tiers will not be required to **do the above** steps when joining the IDO pool. However, we recommend following Twitter and Telegram groups to stay up-to-date with important announcements.*

# 2ï¸âƒ£ Step 2: Register an account on the Red Kite website.

Please follow the guideline [HERE](https://redkite-faq.polkafoundry.com/guides/before-joining-idos.html#_1-1-register-account).

# 3ï¸âƒ£ Step 3: Staking PKF to claim your tier.

Stake to ensure you achieve at least the minimum tier of the pool.

If it is your first time staking on Red Kite, you will need to **Approve** tokens once (and only once) before you stake PKF.

ğŸ“Œ ***NOTE***: *Refer to the latest tier policy on Red Kite [HERE](https://medium.com/polkafoundry/aug-21-new-tier-policy-updates-for-red-kite-launchpad-2ac617ad81be) and the staking guideline [HERE](https://redkite-faq.polkafoundry.com/guides/before-joining-idos.html#_1-3-stake-unstake).*

# 4ï¸âƒ£ Step 4: Select the PolkaPets IDO Pool, do KYC, then complete the Whitelist procedure.

* After completing all required tasks according to your tier, select the PolkaPets IDO pool on the Red Kiteâ€™s pool dashboard and click â€œ**Apply whitelist**â€ button.
* A popup will appear and require you to complete KYC procedure. Click â€œ**KYC Now**â€ button and it will navigate you to Icetea Labs KYC on Blockpass. Once doing KYC successfully, come back to the PolkaPets IDO pool and click the â€œ**Apply whitelist**â€ button again.
* Enter your Twitter account and Telegramâ€™s username.
* Click **Submit**.
* After that, Red Kite will ask you to sign your wallet. Click **Sign** on your wallet to complete applying.

The narrow and long Bridge, across the River, leads to the ethereal depths of the cloud.The dusty ghosts whimpered down a bowl of Meng Po soup and set out on an unpredictable path to life.

In the depths of the clouds, there is an invisible attraction, and once the ghost has set foot on the bridge, there is no turning back, only to drift forward, like a moth fighting a fire.

At this moment, there was a very arrogant voice called: "I complain!I must complain!"

With the sound, a very handsome young man came across the bridge. His hair was sleek and shiny, and he was wearing a white suit with many sequins. He looked like a singer who had just walked off the stage.

"Pa!"A bowl of fragrant Meng Po soup immediately fell to the ground, meng Po face accumulation such as furrow wrinkles appear deeper, she murmured a sigh: "the ninth time, the ninth time, the scourge has come back".

The singer like ghost, followed by a pair of ox head horse face, ox head eyes stare to the limit of ox eyes, horse face pulled but longer than donkey face, just because they were determined to refuse to contact zheng Shaopeng came back.

The legend of his nine deaths and eight reincarnations began when he fell off the cable car to Nancang Mountain. Because he held up a three-year-old girl before falling off, accumulating Yin virtue, his Yang life increased by three years.But the hapless couple were in such a hurry to get back to the feast for city god's wife that they caught up with him before he could fall down the ravine.

They woke up from drunk found arrested the wrong person, Zheng Shaopeng has been cremated in the body of the Yang, in order to escape responsibility, they had to pay Cui judge to send him back to the Yang, let him borrow corpse Yang, the three years of life exhausted.

Kingdom...He came back eight times in a year, never more than two months.Speaking of cui judge is pretty good to him, the first time to send him into a just drowned wenzhou rich man.This rich man opened four clothing companies, the family capital 300 million, 68 years old this year, his wife is only 28 years old, three beautiful lovers are younger, the youngest only 18 years old, enough to live up to him, right?

The problem is...The rich man had not been drowned in the river, nor in the sea, but in the bathtub, while bathing, by his charming and beautiful wife.

See floating in the air waiting for the possession of zheng Shaopeng creepy, so in his tears and tears do not want to be pushed into the cow's head horse face just drowned billionaire inside the body, he really can not enjoy this kind of amorous blessing.

In two weeks, he learned the whole operation and situation of the company, and then gave a third of the wealth to the rich man's ruined wife and two abandoned sons, the rest of the way to donate.

A month later, when they saw him dead and alive, and all day long with a strange eyes looked at her, and scared her beautiful wife mad directly, with a fruit knife to him constantly tong tong, such as devils in animal forms were called to, also feel that thousand gen holes bodies again let him with a raised a little sick, and had to put him back to hell.

Of course, Zheng Shaopeng will not say that he is suspected that the old guy on the hard place has been soft, the soft place is all hard, so just deliberately looking for death, so the judge adult racked their brains and sent him to a vice mayor who just died of illness.

At 48, the deputy mayor is in the prime of his life. He lives in an advanced ward, covered in tubes, and the traffic that greeted his arrival has been largely empty since the attending doctor told the organisation that a memorial service was planned for him.

Zheng Shaopeng didn't think he could be such a big official. He really wanted to have something to do, but he really couldn't bear to have a woman who was fast catching up with his mother's age when his wife.

So he stayed in the hospital all day, refusing to go home. It was a great relief when he found out that the deputy mayor was actually one of a group of corrupt people.

He collected a pile of evidence sent to the provincial commission for Discipline inspection, so in the organization of severe investigation of the case, he was honorably and actively killed by the original associates.

No one is perfect, Zheng Shaopeng can only sigh so with regret, why there is no young and rich, handsome and uninhibited, charming and elegant childe?

Er...In fact, it is not that there is no, but the young man who meets these conditions is healthy and eats well, and he will have to wait for possession.

It is not easy for him to possess the body for the eighth time to a handsome and handsome, famous Hong Kong and Taiwan red singer body, which is then his wish, the total should be good enough to stay this two years Yang shou bar.

Surprise ah surprise......He actually died back, not to mention poor Judge Cui, even ox head horse face are almost mad.

Zheng Shaopeng was greatly relieved when he happily attached himself to the famous singer who had just died of illness, and was horrified to discover that the charming young man who had made countless girls crazy was actually a gay, and was playing the role of zero.

title: Blue cloth gown
body:
Girls passing by the roadside, as long as they look at Lin Wanrong's dress, without looking at his face, they PASS him directly, their eyes directly to the so-called talents shivering in the cold wind standing on the bow.

All of a sudden, the beauties of the roadside like crazy to the lake to squeeze, constantly overlooking the lake, warbler yan Yan's cry is very sweet.

"Wow, look, look, it's the first jinling wit, The childe of white Hou --"

"Wow, how handsome --"

"Wow, that's crazy --"

'Why, what lady has been so fortunate --'

Lin Wanrong down the girls' eyes pointed to, looking forward.

I saw three painted pleasure boats floating along the lake, each with two stories and about six or seven meters high.Lanterns hung high, eaves pavilion, is called the lofty lofty.

The three pleasure boats are decorated with banners, one on the left and one on the right with huge banners falling from the roofs.

On the right is "Spring breeze caresses my heart", and on the left is "Only for you".

In the middle of a boat, a young man stood on the bow, his face like a crown of jade, caress the fan light standing, smiling, long gown fluttering, indescribable chic taste.

Opposite the three pleasure boats is a larger exquisite pleasure boat, larger than Hou's three pleasure boats, with eaves and pavilions and indescribable style.Unfortunately, the curtain was so deep that it was hard to see what she looked like inside. On a huge lantern flying in the wind at the bow was written the word "Luo" in gilt letters.

Are NFTs Truly Decentralized Art?
August 30, 2021
body:
[https://pastel.network/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/are-nfts-decentralized-1000x500.png](https://pastel.network/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/are-nfts-decentralized-1000x500.png)

There are quite a bit of misunderstandings around NFTs. Many people think NFTs are minted on the Ethereum blockchain through a platform like Rarible and â€” voila! â€” the art is non-fungible and lives forever in a decentralized manner on the blockchain. But thatâ€™s not entirely the case. NFTs, or â€œnon-fungible tokensâ€ are really only non-fungible to the extent that it refers to the actual token, not the underlying artwork or rare asset itself. As such, the token and the â€œassetâ€ it represents are two completely different things.

Huh?

Okay, letâ€™s rewind a bit here. Although NFTs are often associated with digital art or GIFs these days, the reality is that they are better understood as a class of assets that are non-fungible. The $10 bill you used to pay for the coffee this morning? Fungible. The fingerprint you left on the bill when paying? Non-fungible. But is your fingerprint an asset? Debatable, depending on how much fingerprints go for on the black market these days (a joke, relax). But a key thing to remember is that non-fungible does not classify an object as rare, nor does it ensure that it is â€˜rareâ€™ or even decentralized.

This concept was probably best illustrated with a recent â€œrug pullâ€ stunt conducted by one clever sculptor on the OpenSea platform. The artist exchanged the original JPEG images that the collectors thought they were purchasing with random pictures of rugs after the sale concluded. The intent of the stunt was to highlight the inherent problem of the current NFT infrastructure â€” which is mostly built on the Ethereum blockchain. By purchasing the NFT, the buyer would simply own the token to authenticate the JPEG listed on OpenSea, which at the time of purchase was a dope piece of art. But because the underlying digital asset itself is not decentralized, and might be stored on a central server somewhere such as on AWS or GCS, the buyer has no control in terms of what the NFT itself represents.

In other words, the non-fungibility is currently applied to the token representing the transaction of the purchase â€” not necessarily the owner of the physical (or digital) piece of art.

This is a common problem in the NFT sphere, as buyers often misunderstand the underlying infrastructure of the art they are buying, which can be problematic when there isnâ€™t a physical equivalent of the purchase, ie: a digital GIF.

With most NFT marketplaces being built on Ethereum, another key problem is raised. The Ethereum network is often congested by other sectors such as DeFi, which eat up the majority of the bandwidth and exponentially raises the prices for minting and transacting NFTs. When compounded with the previously outlined problem, it is easy to see why the NFT art space is not the perfect picture it is painted to be after all.

This is where a platform like Pastel can paint a brighter future. Unlike Rarible or OpenSea, Pastel has built its own layer 1 blockchain to compete with Ethereum based platforms. This brings with it an innate advantage because the underlying architecture is designed to be perfectly outfitted and purpose-built for the sole use case for digital art and other rare digital assets, rather than being a do-it-all blockchain like Ethereum. With fewer projects demanding bandwidth, minting and trading NFTs on Pastel is significantly lighter on your (digital) wallet as well due to very low gas costs

In regards to the main problem of preventing â€œrug pullsâ€, Pastel ensures that the art (or other NFT) itself is uploaded, verified, and registered on the Pastel blockchain â€” rather than just the token it is minted with. Through a series of smart tickets living on the Pastel ledger, artists can store their masterpieces in a distributed fashion across a variety of Supernodes as opposed to just ensuring the token is non-fungible. This sophisticated storage layer, leveraging the RaptorQ fountain code algorithm, ensures that each asset is broken up and stored in a series of redundant, fungible chunks. These sets of chunks ar ethen distributed across the network using the Kademlia DHT algorithm. So what does this really mean? In short, even if over 90% of hosted instances suddenly go down, the remaining information can be reconstructed quickly and there is no possibility of the artwork disappearing.

So the next time you purchase an NFT, make sure you understand how and where your rare digital asset is stored â€” so that you wonâ€™t have the rug pulled out from underneath you.

title: Beyond JPEGs and GIFs: What to Expect of Future NFT Use Cases
body:
With so much recent activity in the NFT art space, it may seem tricky to separate the concept of NFTs from the lucrative flipping of JPEGs and GIFs.Â 

It shouldnâ€™t be a surprise that the topic of NFTs often brings up a few consistent data points:Â 

* *Memes like [Nyan Cat selling for $580,000](https://pastel.network/nyan-cat-crypto-art-sells-for-300-eth-580000/).*


* *Graphic Designer [Beepleâ€™s art selling for $69 million.](https://pastel.network/top-6-types-of-digital-art-in-2021/)*


* *[Squiggles selling for tens of millions](https://opensea.io/collection/art-blocks?search\[query\]=squigg&search\[sortAscending\]=true&search\[sortBy\]=PRICE)*

An NFT is simply just a token on a blockchain that identifies something unique; this â€œsomethingâ€ can be anything from a house to the legal rights of an idea.Â 

The following article explores how NFTs stand to revolutionize a few industries ripe for renovation.Â 

## Why NFTs?

NFTs are unique digital tokens in that they can **carry data** stored in an immutable blockchain ledger; this data specifies a .JPEG, MP4, or .TXT of a contract.Â 

Every time a specific NFT token goes through a transaction, the blockchain adds a new block to the blockchain with the new ownerâ€™s information. This chain of transactions allows one to trace the ownership of digital assets throughout the entirety of its history.Â 

Keep the following features of NFTs in mind before we go through the top future NFT use cases:

**Indivisible:** The â€œnon-fungibilityâ€ of NFTs means that they cannot be broken down into sub-assetsâ€“ you technically canâ€™t cut a CryptoPunk into a dozen pieces. However, there can be fractional ownership of a single NFT; multiple people can share a percentage of the NFT through other mechanisms.Â 

**Verifiable:** The blockchain gives anyone the ability to verify the authenticity of a digital asset, no matter how many times it has changed hands.Â 

**Indestructible:** Since an NFT exists solely on the blockchain, it cannot be destroyed. For example, letâ€™s say you buy a Cool Cat NFT for the ETH equivalent of $15,000. You decide to buy a digital frame for $150 and put it on your wall. If a burglar breaks in and steals your frame, you only lose the frame; the NFT would still exist on the blockchain.Â 

## #1: Real Estate

Real estate is an industry entrenched in traditional, inefficient processes. The actual ownership of physical real estate alone is a sub-sector of the industry exhausted by outdated practices. For example, in order to prove you own a property, youâ€™d use a title deed document to prove so. If itâ€™s misplaced, or its record cannot be found online, you could find yourself riled in legal disputes and complexities.Â 

All of this can be avoided by using NFTs. Since these tokens digitally represent assets, such as land, buildings, or even rooms, tracking the ownership and authenticity of a tokenized property would be possible from anywhere in the world.Â 

One such startup, [Propy](https://propy.com/browse/), is already utilizing NFTs for real-estate transactions.Â 

Itâ€™s worth noting that NFTs are also being used to represent virtual land ownership, as seen on projects like *[Decentraland](https://decentraland.org/).*Â 

Decentraland

## #2: TicketingÂ 

If youâ€™ve ever bought a ticket to see a concert or sporting event online, youâ€™d get a quick glance at one of the most visible ticket industry problemsâ€“ the â€œconvenienceâ€ fee that sometimes amounts to [20% to 30% of the transaction](https://www.gao.gov/products/gao-18-347).

Even worse, the moment in-demand tickets go for sale online, the site is flooded by scalpers and bots trying to buy as many tickets as they can to flip them for higher prices in secondary markets.Â 

And in these secondary markets, [one out of ten people](https://www.cnbc.com/2018/09/13/about-12-percent-of-people-buying-concert-ticketsget-scammed-.html?ref=hackernoon.com) is likely to get scammed; they frustratingly find out at the event gatesâ€“ potentially hours of travel, waiting in lines, preparation, and excitement only to find out you got ripped off.Â 

NFTs solve most of these problems.

For one, NFTs play nice with other blockchain-based solutions, which tend to disintermediate the middle-man ticketing companies charging a third of the ticket price in convenience fees.Â 

Second, NFTs offer immediate authenticity verification and secure owner transfers. This is an incredibly valuable feature on secondary marketsâ€“ **NFTs make trust the default in a trustless environment.**Â 

## #3. Domain Name Ownership

Blockchain-based domains, usually represented by NFTs, play a very important role in domain ownership.Â 

For starters, NFT domains are owned by you, not rented. No one actually owns a domain, which is a tricky conceptâ€“ you pay to register your domain with a domain name registrar, but not even registrars own the domain. These registrars are delegated the management of top-level domains like â€œ.comâ€ or â€œ.ukâ€ by ICANN (Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers).Â 

Traditional domain name ownership is a rabbithole, but in a nutshell, the whole system only works because everyone in it agrees that it should.Â 

Modern domains can be incredibly valuableâ€“ the most expensive sale yet was [$872 million for Cars.com](https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/39899/000003989915000006/gci-20141228x10k.htm).Â Â 

The problem NFTs solve is that domain name ownership is centralized and vulnerable to centralization. If someone (i.e. the government) wants a specific domain shut down, it can probably get it done with limited complications.Â 

Alternatively, NFT-based domain owners pay a one-time registration fee (compared to an annual renewal cost) and own the domain.Â 

The domain is stored in a wallet just like a cryptocurrency coin or token, and no one can take it from you unless your wallet is hacked.Â 

In practice, your NFT-based domain points to content stored on a decentralized storage network.Â 

NFT Domains can be purchased through retailers like [UnstoppableDomains](https://unstoppabledomains.com/) or on marketplaces like OpenSea.

## #4: Intellectual Property and Patents

Some of the most valuable assets in the world donâ€™t actually exist in the real world, which makes proving or splitting ownership among multiple parties a nebulous task.Â 

Intellectual property and patents are very illiquid, and disputes around ownership or sale can require mountains of paperwork and hundreds of billable legal hours.Â 

Not only can NFTs be used to represent ideas on the blockchain, they can also seamlessly fractionalize this ownership among multiple parties.Â 

The application of NFTs to IPs and patents is still in its nascent stages, but there are a few notable projects making rapid progress, and [NFT licensing framework](https://www.nftlicense.org/) is setting the stage for future innovations.Â 

The most notable progress is by IBMâ€™s collaboration with an [IP ecosystem platform called IPwe](https://newsroom.ibm.com/2021-04-20-IPwe-and-IBM-Seek-to-Transform-Corporate-Patents-With-Next-Generation-NFTs-Using-IBM-Blockchain); the organizations are attempting to tokenize patents so patent owners can enable their trading on safe and accessible marketplaces.Â 

## Final Thoughts

While the above NFT applications are some of the hottest today, this list is by no means exhaustive. If this article is outdated by the time you read itâ€“ good, that means we were right.Â 

Any industry that needs verifiable authenticity will also benefit from the immediacy, finality, and transportability of NFTs.Â 

When updating this article in the future, youâ€™ll see a heap of new use cases emerging from public, private, and government sectors, and hopefully with progressive policies regarding the NFT space.Â 

For now, we anticipate the NFT conversation will continue to be dominated by the most aesthetically consuming and appealing applications of NFTs, but we expect the popular â€œXYZ Art NFT sells for $50 Millionâ€ headlines of today to slowly start morphing to â€œ$114 Million Bel Air Mansion Sells as NFTâ€ or â€œRare Metallica Back-Stage Pass Sells for $10Mâ€ to become commonplace.Â

title: Canadian tech company ChainSafe launches Forest, a Rust-based Filecoin client
body: Canadian tech company ChainSafe has launched Forest, a Rust-based Filecoin client. currently in alpha beta on the Filecoin mainnet, the Forest Rust client can synchronize and validate the Filecoin network, and can also be used as an alternative to the client to check status. The beta has fixed 16 vulnerabilities that were audited by Sigma Prime and is currently awaiting the final audit report. In addition, the beta includes features such as message pooling, state manager, JSON-RPC server, etc.
